main event: An unidentified object was observed in Groveport, Ohio on August 1, 1943, described as a black cloud that transformed into a wide streak in the sky.
interesting points: The object moved rapidly in a twisted and turned motion, then disappeared without a trace., The observer compared the appearance to an anti-aircraft shell burst., No sound was heard during the observation., The object was described as being very high in the sky and visible against clear weather conditions., Two witnesses reported similar observations independently.
sighted object: A small black cloud that turned into a streak in the sky
witness description: A student and a space-type operator from the Veterans Administration.
